subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: After relieving Erik Soler of his general manager duties, the Red Bulls kept up their shake-up by waiving 10 players, including veteran midfielders Jan Gunnar Solli and Teemu Tainio.
snippet: After relieving Erik Soler of his general manager duties, the Red Bulls kept up their shake-up by waiving 10 players, including veteran midfielders Jan Gunnar Solli and Teemu Tainio.
